description: T.1 Japanese Maple - Deadwood (Exempt).G.2 Beech x5 - Fell (exempt).G.3 (T.2-T.6) Holly & Thuja - Fell in 2 stages (exempt).G.4 (T.26) Holly - 4m Reduction in height & cut back from Willow (exempt).G.5 Bamboo - Fell (exempt).G.6 Rhododendron - Fell (exempt).H.4 (T.7-T.12) Thuja - Trim to shape (exempt).H.5 (T.21-T.24) Lawsons Cypress - Fell (Exempt).T.16 Magnolia - 1.5m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points (exempt).T.20 Silver Birch - Fell.T.21 Holly - Fell (exempt).T.28 Willow - Fell.T.29 Eucalyptus - 2.5m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points (exempt).T.32 Magnolia - 2m Holistic crown reductuion to suitable growth points (exempt).
